greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1/(1 + 3*x^k))^k.
comment: In general, for z > 1 or z < -1, if g.f. = Product_{k>=1} (1/(1 - z*x^k))^k, then a(n) ~ c * z^n, where c = Product_{j>=1} 1/(1 - 1/z^j)^(j+1).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 24 2015
